mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_PERMISSION( appId, parentId, icon, name, code, url, rela_url, sort, path_menu, isMenu, isEnable, remark, create_timestamp, create_user_id, last_change_timestamp, change_user_id ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{code}, #{url}, #{rela_url}, #{sort}, #{path_menu}, #{isMenu}, #{isEnable}, #{remark}, #{create_timestamp}, #{create_user_id}, #{last_change_timestamp}, #{change_user_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_PERMISSION a SET a.icon = #{icon}, a.name = #{name}, a.code = #{code}, a.url = #{url}, a.rela_url = #{rela_url}, a.sort = #{sort}, a.path_menu = #{path_menu}, a.isMenu = #{isMenu}, a.isEnable = #{isEnable}, a.remark = #{remark}, a.last_change_timestamp = #{last_change_timestamp}, a.change_user_id = #{change_user_id} WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id AS id, p.parentId AS parentId, p.name AS name, p.url AS url, p.rela_url AS rela_url, p.icon AS icon, p.isMenu AS isMenu FROM SYS_PERMISSION p
INNER JOIN SYS_RE_ROLE_PERMISSION rp ON p.id = rp.permissionId INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.id = rp.roleId AND r.isEnable = 1 INNER JOIN SYS_RE_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.roleId = r.id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.isEnable = 1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYS_APP a WHERE a.id = p.appId AND a.isEnable = 1 AND a.code = #{appCode})
AND ur.userId = #{userId}
ORDER BY p.sort asc
